data.resource_description:
Abermat is a polymer of galacturonic acid, a natural exopolysaccharide excreted by microorganisms cultivated in a bioreactor. Testing on cheeks and chins has shown that 2.00% Abermat absorbed excess sebum and reduced shine on the face.

*An alternate version, Abermat PA, is available upon special request.

formula_description: Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.

Fight signs of aging and pollution! This anti-polluaging formulation glides onto skin effortlessly, delivering moisturization and hydration throughout the stressful city life. It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version and/or Ethoxylate-Free Version.

Formulations featuring the Barcril-AV technology release water when applied to the skin and provide a unique change in texture during application while leaving a soft blurred finish.

formula_description:
H2O Primer is a thin, water-like primer to moisturize and prep skin for the day. Filled with 71 beneficial minerals, H2O Primer will improve the wear of makeup and maintain a healthy look all day long!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version.

resource_description:
BarPull is a natural, film forming complex comprised of a red algae extract, sea water, and natural polysaccharides. This products provides an instant tightening sensation immediately upon application on skin. It was also in vivo tested to provide 24 hours of firming and 8 hours of moisturization.

*An alternate version, BarPull G, is available upon special request.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.
BarLux MG is sophisticated Magnesium Myristate, adds more slip without introducing more oils into emulsions and anhydrous products. Adds body and a unique silky texture.

AesthiNet PA is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels AesthiNet PA achieves in just 24 hours.

*AesthiNet PA is the alternate version of AesthiNet, available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer AesthiGel PA.

*Abermat PA is the alternate version of Abermat, available upon special request.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

formula_description: Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush. Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.

Brighten your day with a double dose of Gellee! Experience the power of the skin brightening actives wrapped in a luxurious gel. A combination of actives derived from pomegranate and other plants target the function and performance of melanocytes, preventing and reducing the appearance of dark spots and brightening the complexion.

Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

resource_description: Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.

AminoHydrane 40S is a sodium salt of polyaspartic acid created from the amino acid L-aspartic acid. Utilizing Aspartic Acid to create a polymer produces a high affinity anionic moisturizer which forms a flexible film on the skin and hair via bio-adhesion. AminoHydrane 40S creates a barrier on the hair that protects and resists frizz.

*An alternate version, AminoHydrane PDR, is available upon special request.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.

data.resource_description:
Adipolin is an extract of Brazilian Pepper, a kind of cashew with a fruit-like appearance. Is is tested at 0.1% for 4 weeks on 25 people reduced the waistline by up to one inch. Adipolin decreases perilipin (a strong enveloping protein) and therefore weakens the adipocyte structure.

*This product contains a California Prop 65 ingredient which may be considered exempt. Please refer to our Technical Dossier or contact technical@barnetproducts.com.

formula_description: Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush. Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

Finish the perfect look with a hint of red! The Natural Lipstick has a smooth, absorbing finish that glides right onto your lips, leaving a beautiful shiny red tint and a light coconut smell behind. Show off your natural beauty with this essential lip formula!

data.resource_description:
Aesthigel PA is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels Aesthigel PA achieves in just 24 hours.

*Aesthigel PA is the alternate version of Aesthigel, available upon special request.

** Aesthigel PA is the China compliant version of AesthiNet PA

formula_description:
Fight signs of aging and pollution! This anti-polluaging formulation glides onto skin effortlessly, delivering moisturization and hydration throughout the stressful city life. It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version and/or Ethoxylate-Free Version.
formula_base: Barcril-AV is a sodium salt of acrylic copolymer, an absorbent powder which holds more than 20 times its dry weight in water. Formulations featuring the Barcril-AV technology release water when applied to the skin and provide a unique change in texture during application while leaving a soft blurred finish.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Brestine were tested to last 6 hours.
It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Brestine were tested to last 6 hours.
It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Brestine were tested to last 6 hours.

BarPull is a natural, film forming complex comprised of a red algae extract, sea water, and natural polysaccharides. This products provides an instant tightening sensation immediately upon application on skin. It was also in vivo tested to provide 24 hours of firming and 8 hours of moisturization.

*An alternate version, BarPull G, is available upon special request.

Redefeyene G is an active ingredient which stimulates Hormone-Sensitive Lipase (HSL) and inhibits Lipid Droplet Association Protein (LDAP) in order to increase lipolysis thus reducing fat storage and the appearance of excess fat. Redefeyene G slims and contours the body as well as reduces under eye puffiness and volume.

Nopalex is an aqueous solution resulting from the fermentation of whole cactus plants containing low molecular weight peptides, carbohydrates and bound minerals. It is tested in vivo to be a strong anti-inflammatory. In addition, Nopalex was tested to reduce stinging induced by lactic acid.

Phyko AI-PF is a concentrated solution of an oligosaccharide from laminaria digitata (brown algae). It is tested in vivo to reduce inflammation in 15 minutes (induced by depilatory wax). In vitro tested at 0.50% - 2.00% proved that Phyko AI-PF reduces IL-1 Alpha, Cyclooxygenase C, Prostaglandin E2, 5-Lipoxygenase and histamine releases.

*An alternate version, Phyko-AIG, is available upon special request.

Kukui Seed Oil is a rich, lubricous plant oil containing approximately 42% Omega 6 (Linoleic Acid) and 30% Omega 3 (Linolenic Acid). Kukui Oil absorbs quickly into the skin without an oily after feel.

*An organic version, Kukui Seed Oil Organic, is available upon special request.

In Tahiti, coconuts are referred to as the fountain of life. TahiCoco is a unique oil concentrate derived from the milk of Tahitian coconuts. As a result, it easily absorbs into the skin without a greasy residue, while still retaining the beautiful aromatic properties of coconut.

data.resource_description:
AminoHydrane 40S is a sodium salt of polyaspartic acid created from the amino acid L-aspartic acid. Utilizing Aspartic Acid to create a polymer produces a high affinity anionic moisturizer which forms a flexible film on the skin and hair via bio-adhesion. AminoHydrane 40S creates a barrier on the hair that protects and resists frizz.

*An alternate version, AminoHydrane PDR, is available upon special request.

resource_description: The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

Redefeyene G is an active ingredient which stimulates Hormone-Sensitive Lipase (HSL) and inhibits Lipid Droplet Association Protein (LDAP) in order to increase lipolysis thus reducing fat storage and the appearance of excess fat. Redefeyene G slims and contours the body as well as reduces under eye puffiness and volume.

Nopalex is an aqueous solution resulting from the fermentation of whole cactus plants containing low molecular weight peptides, carbohydrates and bound minerals. It is tested in vivo to be a strong anti-inflammatory. In addition, Nopalex was tested to reduce stinging induced by lactic acid.

Phyko AI-PF is a concentrated solution of an oligosaccharide from laminaria digitata (brown algae). It is tested in vivo to reduce inflammation in 15 minutes (induced by depilatory wax). In vitro tested at 0.50% - 2.00% proved that Phyko AI-PF reduces IL-1 Alpha, Cyclooxygenase C, Prostaglandin E2, 5-Lipoxygenase and histamine releases.

*An alternate version, Phyko-AIG, is available upon special request.

AcquaCell is a natural fruit complex, designed to deliver important moisture to corneocytes. Tested at 3% on 20 subjects for 2 hours, AcquaCell significantly reduced the appearance of fine lines, “plumping” the cells.

In Tahiti, coconuts are referred to as the fountain of life. TahiCoco is a unique oil concentrate derived from the milk of Tahitian coconuts. As a result, it easily absorbs into the skin without a greasy residue, while still retaining the beautiful aromatic properties of coconut.

Derived from Phosphatidyl Choline from a unique and proprietary process, using enzymes to stabilize the molecule. Twice daily applications of BarPore 42 at 0.1% showed a 20% reduction in the number and size of pores. Tested in vivo at 0.05% on 8 people for 4 weeks, pore size was reduced by 8.5%.

** BarPore 42 is the China compliant version of Disapore 20.

data.resource_description: Extracted from the roots of Angelica acutiloba in Hokkaido and developed to disperse melanin in Keratinocyte. This represents a very new approach for lightening the skin.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

resource_description: BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glyol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. BarDiol IPD improves hair smoothness, repairs hair damage, and reduces fizziness for a tame mane.

AesthiNet is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels AesthiNet achieves in just 24 hours.

*An alternate version, AesthiNet PA, is available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer AesthiGel

Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.
BarLux MG is sophisticated Magnesium Myristate, adds more slip without introducing more oils into emulsions and anhydrous products. Adds body and a unique silky texture.

data.resource_description: Barcleanse STO is a unique non-ionic surfactant that can be used in combination with oils and non-polar waxes to create high efficiency cleansers for anhydrous makeup. When Barcleanse STO is applied and rinsed with water, it self-emulsifies creating a milky-white emulsion, cleansing the skin without leaving an oily after-feel. Barcleanse STO is primarily used in anhydrous cleansing applications such as milks, sticks, exfoliating scrubs, eye makeup removers, and balms.

Bresderm is an exopolysacharide produced by plankton found from the Mer d’Iroise of Brest in Bretagne in France. It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Bresderm were tested to last 6 hours.

*An alternate version, Bresderm PA, is available upon special request.

** Bresderm is the China compliant version of Brestine
Lavandox is a lipophilic extract of unique molecules from Spanish lavender. It was tested in vivo (0.25 – 1.00%) to reduce wrinkles in 24 hours.

Nopalex is an aqueous solution resulting from the fermentation of whole cactus plants containing low molecular weight peptides, carbohydrates and bound minerals. It is tested in vivo to be a strong anti-inflammatory. In addition, Nopalex was tested to reduce stinging induced by lactic acid.

Phyko AI-PF is a concentrated solution of an oligosaccharide from laminaria digitata (brown algae). It is tested in vivo to reduce inflammation in 15 minutes (induced by depilatory wax). In vitro tested at 0.50% - 2.00% proved that Phyko AI-PF reduces IL-1 Alpha, Cyclooxygenase C, Prostaglandin E2, 5-Lipoxygenase and histamine releases.

*An alternate version, Phyko-AIG, is available upon special request.

From a deep marine lake under an Atlantic Island the water percolates and is charged with terrestrial minerals. Applied on the skin in only 15 minutes the number of visible pore is reduced, the skin is mattified. After 2 weeks the skin is less dull as carbonylation is reversed. Far superior than commercial thermal water.

data.resource_description: BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glyol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. BarDiol IPD improves hair smoothness, repairs hair damage, and reduces fizziness for a tame mane.

formula_description: Want a bold look? Fluid Lipstick is the answer for a bright pop of color. With its intense moisturization abilities, lips stay hydrated and smooth all day. The formula easily glides onto lips to complete an effortless bold look!

Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush. Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

BarPull is a natural, film forming complex comprised of a red algae extract, sea water, and natural polysaccharides. This products provides an instant tightening sensation immediately upon application on skin. It was also in vivo tested to provide 24 hours of firming and 8 hours of moisturization.

*An alternate version, BarPull G, is available upon special request.

Redefeyene G is an active ingredient which stimulates Hormone-Sensitive Lipase (HSL) and inhibits Lipid Droplet Association Protein (LDAP) in order to increase lipolysis thus reducing fat storage and the appearance of excess fat. Redefeyene G slims and contours the body as well as reduces under eye puffiness and volume.

Phytofix, solubilized in Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, is a unique and optimized blend containing soluble sphingolipids, triglycerides and sterols. In vivo tests (1%, 3 weeks) showed that Phytofix reduced lines & wrinkles by 60%, reduced flakiness by 45%, improved skin smoothness by 100% and radiance by 50% in two weeks. In vitro tests showed that Phytofix activated PPAR-Alpha (by an increase in water retention and a decrease in stinging).
Arovanda is a lipophilic extract of Spanish lavender. It is tested in vivo to increase corneocyte cohesion resulting in a significant increase in skin hydration.
Monoi de Tahiti is an exclusive blend of Coconut Oil and Tiare Flowers native to the islands of Tahiti. Monoi is tested to be a better moisturizer than Shea Butter and Coconut Oil.

data.resource_description: BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.

data.resource_description: Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.

formula_description: Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.
HOLOBIONT BEAUTY Description: deposition technology which holds active ingredients

resource_description: The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.
It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Brestine were tested to last 6 hours.

Bresderm is an exopolysacharide produced by plankton found from the Mer d’Iroise of Brest in Bretagne in France. It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Bresderm were tested to last 6 hours.

*An alternate version, Bresderm PA, is available upon special request.

** Bresderm is the China compliant version of Brestine

Redefeyene G is an active ingredient which stimulates Hormone-Sensitive Lipase (HSL) and inhibits Lipid Droplet Association Protein (LDAP) in order to increase lipolysis thus reducing fat storage and the appearance of excess fat. Redefeyene G slims and contours the body as well as reduces under eye puffiness and volume.

AcquaCell is a natural fruit complex, designed to deliver important moisture to corneocytes. Tested at 3% on 20 subjects for 2 hours, AcquaCell significantly reduced the appearance of fine lines, “plumping” the cells.

Wakastim is obtained from the fertile bases of the alga Undaria pinnatifida which contain the spores that are responsible for the species reproduction and are considered to have precious rejuvenation virtues. Sustainably sourced and harvested, Wakastim acts to repair and enhance the HLF for smooth, supple, hydrated skin.

Phytofix, solubilized in Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, is a unique and optimized blend containing soluble sphingolipids, triglycerides and sterols. In vivo tests (1%, 3 weeks) showed that Phytofix reduced lines & wrinkles by 60%, reduced flakiness by 45%, improved skin smoothness by 100% and radiance by 50% in two weeks. In vitro tests showed that Phytofix activated PPAR-Alpha (by an increase in water retention and a decrease in stinging).

Chloroplastim is an optimized complex of chloroplast (from Alfalfa), hydrocarbons (from Coconut) and triterpenes (from Olives). It was tested in vivo to be a superior hydrating and anti-wrinkle ingredient.
Arovanda is a lipophilic extract of Spanish lavender. It is tested in vivo to increase corneocyte cohesion resulting in a significant increase in skin hydration.

data.resource_description: BarLux MG is sophisticated Magnesium Myristate, adds more slip without introducing more oils into emulsions and anhydrous products. Adds body and a unique silky texture.

formula_description: A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.

Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush. Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

Brighten your day with a double dose of Gellee! Experience the power of the skin brightening actives wrapped in a luxurious gel. A combination of actives derived from pomegranate and other plants target the function and performance of melanocytes, preventing and reducing the appearance of dark spots and brightening the complexion.

Derived from Phosphatidyl Choline from a unique and proprietary process, using enzymes to stabilize the molecule. Twice daily applications of BarPore 42 at 0.1% showed a 20% reduction in the number and size of pores. Tested in vivo at 0.05% on 8 people for 4 weeks, pore size was reduced by 8.5%.

** BarPore 42 is the China compliant version of Disapore 20.

formula_description:
This weightless Jelly Foundation gives your skin a healthy tinted glow filled with lasting hydration. Create an even complexion, covering imperfections, with this bouncy, spreadable foundation. Jelly Foundation will moisturize your skin all day for a smooth, lasting look.

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.

Get the perfect brow! A brow volumizing tinted gel that creates a natural fullness and definition. The tapered brush provides an easy, mess-proof application to tame stubborn brow hairs. The buildable formula is also long-wearing giving you brows for days!

Want a bold look? Fluid Lipstick is the answer for a bright pop of color. With its intense moisturization abilities, lips stay hydrated and smooth all day. The formula easily glides onto lips to complete an effortless bold look!

Air meets Water for light texture with a burst of hydration! This unique texture is due to the wet processing of the shadow. Apply either color of the Wet Shadow for a rush of sheer color or to achieve the perfect micro-detail. *Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? formula_description: Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

H2O Primer is a thin, water-like primer to moisturize and prep skin for the day. Filled with 71 beneficial minerals, H2O Primer will improve the wear of makeup and maintain a healthy look all day long!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version.

"Protect and repair the skin! This hydrating cream acts as a skin tone corrector to create a flawless, even skin. Infused with Vitamin C ester that fights the first visible sings of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support. Blended with Japanese extracts and sugars helps the skin to reduce urban-induced dark spots by a unique melanin dispersion mechanism. Bye bye age spots!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version."

resource_description: It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Brestine were tested to last 6 hours.
Lavandox is a lipophilic extract of unique molecules from Spanish lavender. It was tested in vivo (0.25 – 1.00%) to reduce wrinkles in 24 hours.

Chloroplastim is an optimized complex of chloroplast (from Alfalfa), hydrocarbons (from Coconut) and triterpenes (from Olives). It was tested in vivo to be a superior hydrating and anti-wrinkle ingredient.
Arovanda is a lipophilic extract of Spanish lavender. It is tested in vivo to increase corneocyte cohesion resulting in a significant increase in skin hydration.

In Tahiti, coconuts are referred to as the fountain of life. TahiCoco is a unique oil concentrate derived from the milk of Tahitian coconuts. As a result, it easily absorbs into the skin without a greasy residue, while still retaining the beautiful aromatic properties of coconut.

Macadamia Seed Oil is a plant oil rich in Omega 7 (Palimitoleic Acid). It contains the highest Omega 7 content of any plant oil. Omega 7 is an important fatty acid in the skin, shown to decrease during aging. Macadamia Seed Oil can be used in anti-aging products to help replenish lost Omega 7.

AminoHydrane 40S is a sodium salt of polyaspartic acid created from the amino acid L-aspartic acid. Utilizing Aspartic Acid to create a polymer produces a high affinity anionic moisturizer which forms a flexible film on the skin and hair via bio-adhesion. AminoHydrane 40S creates a barrier on the hair that protects and resists frizz.

*An alternate version, AminoHydrane PDR, is available upon special request.

Barcleanse STO is a unique non-ionic surfactant that can be used in combination with oils and non-polar waxes to create high efficiency cleansers for anhydrous makeup. When Barcleanse STO is applied and rinsed with water, it self-emulsifies creating a milky-white emulsion, cleansing the skin without leaving an oily after-feel. Barcleanse STO is primarily used in anhydrous cleansing applications such as milks, sticks, exfoliating scrubs, eye makeup removers, and balms.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.

data.resource_description:
BarPull is a natural, film forming complex comprised of a red algae extract, sea water, and natural polysaccharides. This products provides an instant tightening sensation immediately upon application on skin. It was also in vivo tested to provide 24 hours of firming and 8 hours of moisturization.

*An alternate version, BarPull G, is available upon special request.

Finish the perfect look with a hint of red! The Natural Lipstick has a smooth, absorbing finish that glides right onto your lips, leaving a beautiful shiny red tint and a light coconut smell behind. Show off your natural beauty with this essential lip formula!

Get the perfect brow! A brow volumizing tinted gel that creates a natural fullness and definition. The tapered brush provides an easy, mess-proof application to tame stubborn brow hairs. The buildable formula is also long-wearing giving you brows for days!

resource_description: BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glyol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. BarDiol IPD improves hair smoothness, repairs hair damage, and reduces fizziness for a tame mane.

AesthiNet is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels AesthiNet achieves in just 24 hours.

*An alternate version, AesthiNet PA, is available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer AesthiGel

Corneopatch is made up of a large number of mineral sheets (including chlorella, citric acid and lactic acid) which open up in the shape of a helix. Once applied to the skin the helix structure opens , releasing the active but also covering the surface of the skin . Tested at 1% it gives an instant blurring effect which lasts for 8 hours. Transepidermal water loss is reduced by up to 50% after 4 hours.

Abermat is a polymer of galacturonic acid, a natural exopolysaccharide excreted by microorganisms cultivated in a bioreactor. Testing on cheeks and chins has shown that 2.00% Abermat absorbed excess sebum and reduced shine on the face.

*An alternate version, Abermat PA, is available upon special request.

data.resource_description:
Bresderm is an exopolysacharide produced by plankton found from the Mer d’Iroise of Brest in Bretagne in France. It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Bresderm were tested to last 6 hours.

*An alternate version, Bresderm PA, is available upon special request.

** Bresderm is the China compliant version of Brestine

Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. formula_description:
This weightless Jelly Foundation gives your skin a healthy tinted glow filled with lasting hydration. Create an even complexion, covering imperfections, with this bouncy, spreadable foundation. Jelly Foundation will moisturize your skin all day for a smooth, lasting look.

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.

A pocket sized, easy to carry, dewy stick essence which contains approximately 65% moisturizing ingredients. It keeps the skin soft and dewy all day long! Perfect for travel and everyday use to condition and moisturize skin, both at home and on the go!

A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.

Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

resource_description:
Phyko AI-PF is a concentrated solution of an oligosaccharide from laminaria digitata (brown algae). It is tested in vivo to reduce inflammation in 15 minutes (induced by depilatory wax). In vitro tested at 0.50% - 2.00% proved that Phyko AI-PF reduces IL-1 Alpha, Cyclooxygenase C, Prostaglandin E2, 5-Lipoxygenase and histamine releases.

*An alternate version, Phyko-AIG, is available upon special request.

data.resource_description: BV-OSC is a highly stable oil soluble Vitamin C. Tested to outperform other forms of Vitamin C for its anti-oxidant and skin penetration effect. It is tested in vivo to reduce skin pigmentation (2-3%) as well as reducing the appearance of age spots. In addition, BV-OSC is tested to increase collagen synthesis and reduce oxidative damage to cells. BV-OSC is a Quasi-Drug active in Japan (3%) and a Functional Ingredient in Korea (2%) for skin whitening.

product_description_logged:
a:1:{i:0;s:1080:"

[Log In] Bora Bora White Sand is a natural exfoliant from lagoons of polynesian high islands. The Polynesian archipelagos were formed millions of years ago with the emergence of volcanos. As soon as the volcanic activity was finished, coral started developing along the coast, rich is diverse trace elements. The natural process of erosoin leads to the coral detaching itself and creating small particles that arrive on the shore creating white sand beaches. Once picked, the sand is crushed and a natural exfoliating ingredient, Bora Bora White Sand, is formed.

Function

Bora Bora White Sand consists of fine particles (<500um) of coral that have washed ashore on the beaches of Polynesia. Bora Bora White Sand is crushed and riddled in order to obtain a powder. Bora Bora White Sand has natural mineral exfoliation and works best on the face and body in exfoliating gels and exfoliating emulsions.

Formulation

Bora Bora White Sand is a white to ivory find powder with a neutral odor. Bora Bora White Sand is insoluble in oil and water.

";}

formula_description: Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush. Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

This gorgeous burgundy color pop provides full coverage in a liquid lipstick format. Creamilicious Liquid Lipstick glides easily onto lips, leaving lips soft and conditioned. This fromula can also be used as a lip stain once applied and removed leaving a beautiful purple/red tint on the lips.

A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.

Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

Air meets Water for light texture with a burst of hydration! This unique texture is due to the wet processing of the shadow. Apply either color of the Wet Shadow for a rush of sheer color or to achieve the perfect micro-detail. *Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

resource_description:
Derived from Phosphatidyl Choline from a unique and proprietary process, using enzymes to stabilize the molecule. Twice daily applications of BarPore 42 at 0.1% showed a 20% reduction in the number and size of pores. Tested in vivo at 0.05% on 8 people for 4 weeks, pore size was reduced by 8.5%.

** BarPore 42 is the China compliant version of Disapore 20.
BarLux MG is sophisticated Magnesium Myristate, adds more slip without introducing more oils into emulsions and anhydrous products. Adds body and a unique silky texture.

Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.

data.resource_description: Corneopatch is made up of a large number of mineral sheets (including chlorella, citric acid and lactic acid) which open up in the shape of a helix. Once applied to the skin the helix structure opens , releasing the active but also covering the surface of the skin . Tested at 1% it gives an instant blurring effect which lasts for 8 hours. Transepidermal water loss is reduced by up to 50% after 4 hours.

formula_description:
It’s all about that gloss! Formulated with a unique soufflé texture that applies like a gel but dries like a powder lasting all day. It provides high shine with a buildable coverage to get the perfect glossy eyelids. Ready, set, Gloss!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version.

Fight signs of aging and pollution! This anti-polluaging formulation glides onto skin effortlessly, delivering moisturization and hydration throughout the stressful city life. It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version and/or Ethoxylate-Free Version.
formula_base: Barcril-AV is a sodium salt of acrylic copolymer, an absorbent powder which holds more than 20 times its dry weight in water. Formulations featuring the Barcril-AV technology release water when applied to the skin and provide a unique change in texture during application while leaving a soft blurred finish.

formula_description: Get the perfect brow! A brow volumizing tinted gel that creates a natural fullness and definition. The tapered brush provides an easy, mess-proof application to tame stubborn brow hairs. The buildable formula is also long-wearing giving you brows for days!

"Protect and repair the skin! This hydrating cream acts as a skin tone corrector to create a flawless, even skin. Infused with Vitamin C ester that fights the first visible sings of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support. Blended with Japanese extracts and sugars helps the skin to reduce urban-induced dark spots by a unique melanin dispersion mechanism. Bye bye age spots!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version."

BarPull is a natural, film forming complex comprised of a red algae extract, sea water, and natural polysaccharides. This products provides an instant tightening sensation immediately upon application on skin. It was also in vivo tested to provide 24 hours of firming and 8 hours of moisturization.

*An alternate version, BarPull G, is available upon special request.

resource_description: Barcleanse STO is a unique non-ionic surfactant that can be used in combination with oils and non-polar waxes to create high efficiency cleansers for anhydrous makeup. When Barcleanse STO is applied and rinsed with water, it self-emulsifies creating a milky-white emulsion, cleansing the skin without leaving an oily after-feel. Barcleanse STO is primarily used in anhydrous cleansing applications such as milks, sticks, exfoliating scrubs, eye makeup removers, and balms.

AesthiNet is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels AesthiNet achieves in just 24 hours.

*An alternate version, AesthiNet PA, is available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer AesthiGel
Extracted from the roots of Angelica acutiloba in Hokkaido and developed to disperse melanin in Keratinocyte. This represents a very new approach for lightening the skin.

formula_description:
Fight signs of aging and pollution! This anti-polluaging formulation glides onto skin effortlessly, delivering moisturization and hydration throughout the stressful city life. It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version and/or Ethoxylate-Free Version.
formula_base: Barcril-AV is a sodium salt of acrylic copolymer, an absorbent powder which holds more than 20 times its dry weight in water. Formulations featuring the Barcril-AV technology release water when applied to the skin and provide a unique change in texture during application while leaving a soft blurred finish.

A combination of actives derived from pomegranate and other plants target the function and performance of melanocytes, preventing and reducing the appearance of dark spots and brightening the complexion.

Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

Air meets Water for light texture with a burst of hydration! This unique texture is due to the wet processing of the shadow. Apply either color of the Wet Shadow for a rush of sheer color or to achieve the perfect micro-detail. *Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.

resource_description: Barcleanse STO is a unique non-ionic surfactant that can be used in combination with oils and non-polar waxes to create high efficiency cleansers for anhydrous makeup. When Barcleanse STO is applied and rinsed with water, it self-emulsifies creating a milky-white emulsion, cleansing the skin without leaving an oily after-feel. Barcleanse STO is primarily used in anhydrous cleansing applications such as milks, sticks, exfoliating scrubs, eye makeup removers, and balms.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.
Extracted from the roots of Angelica acutiloba in Hokkaido and developed to disperse melanin in Keratinocyte. This represents a very new approach for lightening the skin.

Derived from Phosphatidyl Choline from a unique and proprietary process, using enzymes to stabilize the molecule. Twice daily applications of BarPore 42 at 0.1% showed a 20% reduction in the number and size of pores. Tested in vivo at 0.05% on 8 people for 4 weeks, pore size was reduced by 8.5%.

** BarPore 42 is the China compliant version of Disapore 20.

data.resource_description: It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Brestine were tested to last 6 hours.

formula_description: A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.

Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush. Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

Get the perfect brow! A brow volumizing tinted gel that creates a natural fullness and definition. The tapered brush provides an easy, mess-proof application to tame stubborn brow hairs. The buildable formula is also long-wearing giving you brows for days!

resource_description: Barcleanse STO is a unique non-ionic surfactant that can be used in combination with oils and non-polar waxes to create high efficiency cleansers for anhydrous makeup. When Barcleanse STO is applied and rinsed with water, it self-emulsifies creating a milky-white emulsion, cleansing the skin without leaving an oily after-feel. Barcleanse STO is primarily used in anhydrous cleansing applications such as milks, sticks, exfoliating scrubs, eye makeup removers, and balms.

AesthiNet is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels AesthiNet achieves in just 24 hours.

*An alternate version, AesthiNet PA, is available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer AesthiGel

Corneopatch is made up of a large number of mineral sheets (including chlorella, citric acid and lactic acid) which open up in the shape of a helix. Once applied to the skin the helix structure opens , releasing the active but also covering the surface of the skin . Tested at 1% it gives an instant blurring effect which lasts for 8 hours. Transepidermal water loss is reduced by up to 50% after 4 hours.

From a deep marine lake under an Atlantic Island the water percolates and is charged with terrestrial minerals. Applied on the skin in only 15 minutes the number of visible pore is reduced, the skin is mattified. After 2 weeks the skin is less dull as carbonylation is reversed. Far superior than commercial thermal water.

data.resource_description:
Kukui Seed Oil is a rich, lubricous plant oil containing approximately 42% Omega 6 (Linoleic Acid) and 30% Omega 3 (Linolenic Acid). Kukui Oil absorbs quickly into the skin without an oily after feel.

*An organic version, Kukui Seed Oil Organic, is available upon special request.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

Omega 7 is an important fatty acid in the skin, shown to decrease during aging. Macadamia Seed Oil can be used in anti-aging products to help replenish lost Omega 7.

Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

resource_description: It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Brestine were tested to last 6 hours.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.

Barcleanse STO is a unique non-ionic surfactant that can be used in combination with oils and non-polar waxes to create high efficiency cleansers for anhydrous makeup. When Barcleanse STO is applied and rinsed with water, it self-emulsifies creating a milky-white emulsion, cleansing the skin without leaving an oily after-feel. Barcleanse STO is primarily used in anhydrous cleansing applications such as milks, sticks, exfoliating scrubs, eye makeup removers, and balms.
BarLux MG is sophisticated Magnesium Myristate, adds more slip without introducing more oils into emulsions and anhydrous products. Adds body and a unique silky texture.

[Log In] Bora Bora White Sand is a natural exfoliant from lagoons of polynesian high islands. The Polynesian archipelagos were formed millions of years ago with the emergence of volcanos. As soon as the volcanic activity was finished, coral started developing along the coast, rich is diverse trace elements. The natural process of erosoin leads to the coral detaching itself and creating small particles that arrive on the shore creating white sand beaches. Once picked, the sand is crushed and a natural exfoliating ingredient, Bora Bora White Sand, is formed.

Function

Bora Bora White Sand consists of fine particles (<500um) of coral that have washed ashore on the beaches of Polynesia. Bora Bora White Sand is crushed and riddled in order to obtain a powder. Bora Bora White Sand has natural mineral exfoliation and works best on the face and body in exfoliating gels and exfoliating emulsions.

Formulation

Bora Bora White Sand is a white to ivory find powder with a neutral odor. Bora Bora White Sand is insoluble in oil and water.

";}

resource_description: Barcleanse STO is a unique non-ionic surfactant that can be used in combination with oils and non-polar waxes to create high efficiency cleansers for anhydrous makeup. When Barcleanse STO is applied and rinsed with water, it self-emulsifies creating a milky-white emulsion, cleansing the skin without leaving an oily after-feel. Barcleanse STO is primarily used in anhydrous cleansing applications such as milks, sticks, exfoliating scrubs, eye makeup removers, and balms.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.

AminoHydrane 40S is a sodium salt of polyaspartic acid created from the amino acid L-aspartic acid. Utilizing Aspartic Acid to create a polymer produces a high affinity anionic moisturizer which forms a flexible film on the skin and hair via bio-adhesion. AminoHydrane 40S creates a barrier on the hair that protects and resists frizz.

*An alternate version, AminoHydrane PDR, is available upon special request.

Corneopatch is made up of a large number of mineral sheets (including chlorella, citric acid and lactic acid) which open up in the shape of a helix. Once applied to the skin the helix structure opens , releasing the active but also covering the surface of the skin . Tested at 1% it gives an instant blurring effect which lasts for 8 hours. Transepidermal water loss is reduced by up to 50% after 4 hours.

TahiVani is an oil, enriched with active molecules of Vanilla Tahitensis. Vanilla Tahitensis is a hybrid of Vanilla Planifolia and Vanilla Odorate. Vanilla Tahitensis is rich in phenols and phenolics such as Anisic alcohol, Vanillin and Anisic aldehyde. TahiVani is natural moisturizing emollient that has good stability against oxidation.

formula_description: Brighten your day with a double dose of Gellee! Experience the power of the skin brightening actives wrapped in a luxurious gel. A combination of actives derived from pomegranate and other plants target the function and performance of melanocytes, preventing and reducing the appearance of dark spots and brightening the complexion.

Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

resource_description: Barcleanse STO is a unique non-ionic surfactant that can be used in combination with oils and non-polar waxes to create high efficiency cleansers for anhydrous makeup. When Barcleanse STO is applied and rinsed with water, it self-emulsifies creating a milky-white emulsion, cleansing the skin without leaving an oily after-feel. Barcleanse STO is primarily used in anhydrous cleansing applications such as milks, sticks, exfoliating scrubs, eye makeup removers, and balms.

Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.

AesthiNet PA is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels AesthiNet PA achieves in just 24 hours.

*AesthiNet PA is the alternate version of AesthiNet, available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer AesthiGel PA.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.

data.resource_description: Nopalex is an aqueous solution resulting from the fermentation of whole cactus plants containing low molecular weight peptides, carbohydrates and bound minerals. It is tested in vivo to be a strong anti-inflammatory. In addition, Nopalex was tested to reduce stinging induced by lactic acid.

resource_description:
AesthiNet is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels AesthiNet achieves in just 24 hours.

*An alternate version, AesthiNet PA, is available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer AesthiGel

AminoHydrane 40S is a sodium salt of polyaspartic acid created from the amino acid L-aspartic acid. Utilizing Aspartic Acid to create a polymer produces a high affinity anionic moisturizer which forms a flexible film on the skin and hair via bio-adhesion. AminoHydrane 40S creates a barrier on the hair that protects and resists frizz.

*An alternate version, AminoHydrane PDR, is available upon special request.
BarLux MG is sophisticated Magnesium Myristate, adds more slip without introducing more oils into emulsions and anhydrous products. Adds body and a unique silky texture.

Barcleanse STO is a unique non-ionic surfactant that can be used in combination with oils and non-polar waxes to create high efficiency cleansers for anhydrous makeup. When Barcleanse STO is applied and rinsed with water, it self-emulsifies creating a milky-white emulsion, cleansing the skin without leaving an oily after-feel. Barcleanse STO is primarily used in anhydrous cleansing applications such as milks, sticks, exfoliating scrubs, eye makeup removers, and balms.

data.resource_description:
Phyko AI-PF is a concentrated solution of an oligosaccharide from laminaria digitata (brown algae). It is tested in vivo to reduce inflammation in 15 minutes (induced by depilatory wax). In vitro tested at 0.50% - 2.00% proved that Phyko AI-PF reduces IL-1 Alpha, Cyclooxygenase C, Prostaglandin E2, 5-Lipoxygenase and histamine releases.

*An alternate version, Phyko-AIG, is available upon special request.

Brestine PA is an exopolysacharide produced by plankton found from the Mer d’Iroise of Brest in Bretagne in France. It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Brestine PA were tested to last 6 hours.

*Brestine PA is the alternate version of Brestine, available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer Bresderm PA

data.resource_description: Phytofix, solubilized in Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, is a unique and optimized blend containing soluble sphingolipids, triglycerides and sterols. In vivo tests (1%, 3 weeks) showed that Phytofix reduced lines & wrinkles by 60%, reduced flakiness by 45%, improved skin smoothness by 100% and radiance by 50% in two weeks. In vitro tests showed that Phytofix activated PPAR-Alpha (by an increase in water retention and a decrease in stinging).

formula_description: Finish the perfect look with a hint of red! The Natural Lipstick has a smooth, absorbing finish that glides right onto your lips, leaving a beautiful shiny red tint and a light coconut smell behind. Show off your natural beauty with this essential lip formula!

Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush. Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

resource_description: BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glyol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. BarDiol IPD improves hair smoothness, repairs hair damage, and reduces fizziness for a tame mane.
BarLux MG is sophisticated Magnesium Myristate, adds more slip without introducing more oils into emulsions and anhydrous products. Adds body and a unique silky texture.

Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.

data.resource_description: Redefeyene G is an active ingredient which stimulates Hormone-Sensitive Lipase (HSL) and inhibits Lipid Droplet Association Protein (LDAP) in order to increase lipolysis thus reducing fat storage and the appearance of excess fat. Redefeyene G slims and contours the body as well as reduces under eye puffiness and volume.

formula_description:
Fight signs of aging and pollution! This anti-polluaging formulation glides onto skin effortlessly, delivering moisturization and hydration throughout the stressful city life. It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version and/or Ethoxylate-Free Version.

formula_description: Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush. Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

Brighten your day with a double dose of Gellee! Experience the power of the skin brightening actives wrapped in a luxurious gel. A combination of actives derived from pomegranate and other plants target the function and performance of melanocytes, preventing and reducing the appearance of dark spots and brightening the complexion.

Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

concept_description: Barsoft TXM is a glycerin complex which improves the aesthetics of water.

resource_description:
AminoHydrane 40S is a sodium salt of polyaspartic acid created from the amino acid L-aspartic acid. Utilizing Aspartic Acid to create a polymer produces a high affinity anionic moisturizer which forms a flexible film on the skin and hair via bio-adhesion. AminoHydrane 40S creates a barrier on the hair that protects and resists frizz.

*An alternate version, AminoHydrane PDR, is available upon special request.

BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glyol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. BarDiol IPD improves hair smoothness, repairs hair damage, and reduces fizziness for a tame mane.

Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.

AesthiNet is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels AesthiNet achieves in just 24 hours.

*An alternate version, AesthiNet PA, is available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer AesthiGel

data.resource_description: It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Brestine were tested to last 6 hours.

It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version and/or Ethoxylate-Free Version.

Formulations featuring the Barcril-AV technology release water when applied to the skin and provide a unique change in texture during application while leaving a soft blurred finish.

formula_description: Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

Brighten your day with a double dose of Gellee! Experience the power of the skin brightening actives wrapped in a luxurious gel. A combination of actives derived from pomegranate and other plants target the function and performance of melanocytes, preventing and reducing the appearance of dark spots and brightening the complexion.

This weightless Jelly Foundation gives your skin a healthy tinted glow filled with lasting hydration. Create an even complexion, covering imperfections, with this bouncy, spreadable foundation. Jelly Foundation will moisturize your skin all day for a smooth, lasting look.

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.

Finish the perfect look with a hint of red! The Natural Lipstick has a smooth, absorbing finish that glides right onto your lips, leaving a beautiful shiny red tint and a light coconut smell behind. Show off your natural beauty with this essential lip formula!

An easy-to-apply and highly blendable stick created the perfect, lightweight no-makeup makeup look! A creamy texture formulated with mineral powders, pigments and moisturizers to get the full coverage look without feeling it! This is the perfect filter-free stick foundation to take with you from morning to night!

This silicone system will provide long wear and resistance against water and perspiration while protecting against the sun’s rays. Unlike oil-in-water formulas, sunscreens remain on top of the skin instead of being absorbed to create a shield between the sun and skin barrier. Protect your skin with W/Si Physical Sunscreen!

"This unique oil-in-water formula deeply cleanses skin and can be tissued off. Cleansing Cream melts onto the skin, releasing the oil phase and washing away all impurities, perfect for waterproof makeup!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version."

A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.

"Calm your skin with Soothing Pressed Serum, designed to brighten and clarify skin while reducing irritation and redness. Infused with actives that help accelerate the recovery of blemishes, this soothing serum will melt into your skin for a nourished, clear complexion.

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version."

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.
HOLOBIONT BEAUTY Description: deposition technology which holds active ingredients
NET-LCS is a unique Liquid Crystal system which functions as a second skin.
Polyolprepolymers are a patented delivery
Polyolprepolymers were also tested to add water resistance to sunscreens

resource_description:
AminoHydrane 40S is a sodium salt of polyaspartic acid created from the amino acid L-aspartic acid. Utilizing Aspartic Acid to create a polymer produces a high affinity anionic moisturizer which forms a flexible film on the skin and hair via bio-adhesion. AminoHydrane 40S creates a barrier on the hair that protects and resists frizz.

*An alternate version, AminoHydrane PDR, is available upon special request.

AesthiNet PA is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels AesthiNet PA achieves in just 24 hours.

*AesthiNet PA is the alternate version of AesthiNet, available upon special request.

**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer AesthiGel PA.

Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.

Derived from Phosphatidyl Choline from a unique and proprietary process, using enzymes to stabilize the molecule. Twice daily applications of BarPore 42 at 0.1% showed a 20% reduction in the number and size of pores. Tested in vivo at 0.05% on 8 people for 4 weeks, pore size was reduced by 8.5%.

** BarPore 42 is the China compliant version of Disapore 20.

data.resource_description: TahiVani is an oil, enriched with active molecules of Vanilla Tahitensis. Vanilla Tahitensis is a hybrid of Vanilla Planifolia and Vanilla Odorate. Vanilla Tahitensis is rich in phenols and phenolics such as Anisic alcohol, Vanillin and Anisic aldehyde. TahiVani is natural moisturizing emollient that has good stability against oxidation.

formula_description:
H2O Primer is a thin, water-like primer to moisturize and prep skin for the day. Filled with 71 beneficial minerals, H2O Primer will improve the wear of makeup and maintain a healthy look all day long!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version.

Get the perfect brow! A brow volumizing tinted gel that creates a natural fullness and definition. The tapered brush provides an easy, mess-proof application to tame stubborn brow hairs. The buildable formula is also long-wearing giving you brows for days!

"Protect and repair the skin! This hydrating cream acts as a skin tone corrector to create a flawless, even skin. Infused with Vitamin C ester that fights the first visible sings of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support. Blended with Japanese extracts and sugars helps the skin to reduce urban-induced dark spots by a unique melanin dispersion mechanism. Bye bye age spots!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version."

Unlike oil-in-water formulas, sunscreens remain on top of the skin instead of being absorbed to create a shield between the sun and skin barrier. Protect your skin with W/Si Physical Sunscreen!

A pocket sized, easy to carry, dewy stick essence which contains approximately 65% moisturizing ingredients. It keeps the skin soft and dewy all day long! Perfect for travel and everyday use to condition and moisturize skin, both at home and on the go!

Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

formula_description: Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

Air meets Water for light texture with a burst of hydration! This unique texture is due to the wet processing of the shadow. Apply either color of the Wet Shadow for a rush of sheer color or to achieve the perfect micro-detail. *Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.
NET-LCS is a unique Liquid Crystal system which functions as a second skin.

resource_description: BarDiol IPD is a high-performance glycol commonly used as an alternative to glycols (due to it not having glycol in its INCI designation). It acts as a functional humectant and has a lighter texture than other glycols working to add an emollient feel without drag. In addition to its emolliency properties, it has excellent solubilization and mild anti-microbial properties.
BarLux MG is sophisticated Magnesium Myristate, adds more slip without introducing more oils into emulsions and anhydrous products. Adds body and a unique silky texture.

Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.
